definition[0]: a special sign that is used to show an emotion in email and on the Internet, often by making a picture. For example, the emoticon :-) looks like a smiling face and means that you have made a joke.
definition[1]: one of a set of characters used to express feeling in writing, such as in an E-MAIL message. For example, the emoticon :-> is used after a comment to show that the comment is not intended to be serious
